page.title: 06LAINDON WEST COMMUNITY HALL
page.content: The children of our school use the facilities of the{Laindon West {Community Centre,}Hoover Drive. Many activities go on there, dancing classes, playgroups, bingo, youth clubs, keep-fit, mother and toddler groups, etc. Usually on a Saturday the centre is hired out for a wedding reception. The centre is used by lots of people of different ages from babies to old age pensioners. We interviewed{Mr.Paul Blake}who is the{secretary}of the centre. His work at the centre is voluntary. He is helped by four adult volunteers. Mr. Blake got involved with the centre because he was concerned with what goes on locally. He feels that community centres in Laindon are important. They are needed for young people especially as there are few facilities for them in Laindon.
